summary.value: Every power come with a price, the question is: are you willing to pay it?

system.description:
ALSO: Cursed, Half-Devil, Sorcerer

While most people rightly fear demons and their tricks, demoncallers have learned to obtain and master their powers.

The relationship between a demoncaller, their powers and the demons behind them is often ambiguous, even dangerous. It's like a constant game of cat and mouse, where everyone thinks they're the cat, without really having any proof until the last moment.

DEMONCALLER FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points or Mind Points by 5 (your choice).

DEMONCALLER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.KfeQBezlHMm3ggni]{Demonics Forms} (SL6)

You are able to obtain (by trading, stealing or extorting them) the powers of demons.

Once per turn, before any other action, you can take the form of a demon whose powers you have obtained. Your weaknesses, resistances, immunities and absorptions are replaced by those of this demon until the end of the scene, or until you take the form of another demon.

You can possess the powers of up to 【SL】 demons. If you gain new powers when you're already at your maximum, you must choose which powers you lose to replace them with these new ones. If you choose this skill at creation, you can immediately posses the powers of up to two demons.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.3KAn3ATOk6o9cXhe]{Unchained Heart} (SL3)

During a conflict, after a roll, you can highlight how your action corresponds to one of the known traits of a demon whose form you have adopted or with whom you have a bond, and pay up to 【SL × 5】 HP. You then get a +1 bonus on this roll for every 5 HP paid.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.bEONppj21fgavzER]{Exploit Weakness} (SL5)

When you deal damage that they are Vulnerable to an enemy, they also immediately suffers 【SL × 2】 typeless damages.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.8owLLj18EvyGisAb]{Dark Rituals}

You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Rituals to summon, banish or seal demons, or to provoke effects that could be achieved by a demon whose form you’ve adopted, the magic tests for theses effects use 【MIG + WLP】.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Zbu3ISTuNCHdUp7W]{Forbidden Powers} (SL3)

Learn an NPC spell (except Devastation), you can cast spells learn this way via the Spell action using 【MIG + WLP】, you pay the cost of these spells in HP and not in MP.

If this spell has an effect indicating (choose a type), this type is physical by default. If you have taken a demon form, you may choose an elemental type for which this form offers you resistance, immunity or absorption the first time you cast that spell in this form. This type replaces this indication for all NPC spells you cast in this form from now on.

If this spell has an effect indicating (choose a status), this status is weak by default. If you have taken demon form, you can choose a state from slow, dazed, weak or shaken the first time you cast that spell in this form. This state replaces this indication for all NPC spells you cast in this form from now on.
